comment: This app is okay and all, but an bug i recently encountered is that whenever i press and hold the screen to bring up the menu to add the video to favorites and others doesn't appear. Once that happens I can't exit out of it, neither does switching to "following" or "for you" fixes the issue I have to close the app and open it back up. I'm not sure if anyone else encountered this issue but please fix it in the next update.
scenarios: Press and hold the screen to bring up the menu to add the video to favorites, but the menu does not appear. Once this happens, the user cannot exit out of it.
Switching to "following" or "for you" does not fix the issue; the user has to close and reopen the app.
key sentence: Press and hold the screen to bring up the menu to add the video to favorites, but the menu does not appear. Once this happens, the user cannot exit out of it.
the function of activity: This activity involves various tasks such as searching for contacts, playing, pausing, liking, sharing, and reporting videos, as well as managing user profiles and interactions(following list, follower, like,favorites,private,draft).
the sub-task list of state: [{'name': 'Share to', 'description': 'Share the video to another platform'}, {'name': 'Add to Story', 'description': 'Add the video to your story'}, {'name': 'Repost', 'description': 'Repost the video'}, {'name': 'Copy link', 'description': "Copy the video's link"}, {'name': 'Report', 'description': 'Report the video'}, {'name': 'Not interested', 'description': 'Mark the video as not interesting'}, {'name': 'Save video', 'description': 'Save the video to your device'}, {'name': 'Cast', 'description': 'Cast the video to another device'}, {'name': 'Why this video', 'description': 'Find out why this video was suggested to you'}, {'name': 'Captions', 'description': 'View captions/subtitles for the video'}]
